name: Pillar 2 - Personalized Social Inclusion
description: ALFRED helps prevent social isolation by fostering engagement in social activities, recommending events based on user interests, and supporting communication with friends and family.

clustersList.name: Personalized Social Inclusion
clustersList.description: This cluster covers non-functional needs for respectful, inclusive, and privacy-conscious social engagement. It includes support for moderated content, stigma-free communication, group bonding tools, and options for controlling the degree of visibility in public or semi-public environments.
